content.title: Amended application
content.whatToDoNow: You can now submit an amended application
content.amendedApplicationInfoPara1: You recently got in touch with the divorce centre asking to change parts of your application. If you did not make this request please contact the courts immediately.
content.amendedApplicationInfoPara2: You’ll only be able to amend and resubmit your case as long as your husband of wife has not yet responded (acknowledgement of service).
content.amendedApplicationInfoPara3: The fee for an amended application is £95.
content.amendedApplicationInfoPara4: Once the amended application has been submitted, it will be checked by the courts before being issued to the petitioner’s husband/wife so they can respond.
content.downloadWarning: Download and save your current Divorce application. You won’t be able to access any of these documents online after you have changed your application.
content.howToRespondLink: How to respond to a divorce application
content.decreeNisiLink: Decree nisi
content.decreeAbsoluteLink: Decree absolute
content.childrenAndDivorceLink: Children and divorce
content.moneyAndPropertyLink: Money and property
